about.title: About Me
about.about: Former cinema student converted in the programing, development and design area, looking to expend my knowledge and skills on a real and stimulating work shift !
about.sport: I’ve played soccer for 16 years, It taught me to stay focus and build a team spirit. I also made athletism and biking before I got injured. I started climbing a year ago when I arrived in toulouse.
about.hike: I like to go hiking in wild spaces and cut myself from the world, explore the nature and take camp there if I'm gone for several days.
about.book: I’ve studied cinema for 3 years so I appreciate a good movie, I also like reading  inspiring stories and philosophy to have a better understanding of the world and about ourselves.

skills.title: Skills
skills.design: I've been introduced to Webdesign in 2016 in highschool and I liked it so I decided to started focusing on web technologies such as HTML, CSS, SASS or Bootstrap
skills.jsphp: So I started learning on my own Javascript and PHP betwenn 2017 and 2018 to go further into the web technologies.
skills.adrar:
Then I joined in 2019 a training in Adrar School in Toulouse where I could enhance my previous knowledge and apprehend new concepts such as SEO, Data Modelling with UML or Merise.

Object Oriented Programing with Java or PHP and the MVC Design Pattern which I've mostly used during my Internship with ASP.NET MVC
skills.aelion:
I've immediately gone on to another training in Aelion specified in FullStack Development with Spring boot(Java) And Angular.

The cursus was focused around a Cinema application with the first part dedicated to the the building of the back-end with a Java API generating Json datas manageabla with Postman.
Then we built the front-end of the app with Angular.
The whole project was continuousely handled with Git.
skills.django: The lockdown prevented us from joined the company we were supposed to, i kept on my training alone on Spring boot and Angular while I also starded a project in Python with Django.
